title: Trading Convoy
blockb: Immediate: Spend 5 progress and 3 resource dice a faction wants. Receive resource dice of type the faction provides equal to faction disposition.

title: Hilltop Square
blocka: Action: Spend 1 resource die to get 2 fortune dice.

title: Resource Gathering
blocka: Action: Add dice to any one resource pool until it equals the given resource track.

title: Development Research
blocka: Action: Purchase one available development. If put into play immediately, ignore any play cost.

title: Safehome
blockb: Action: Character spends 8 progress to remove one body condition.

title: Amber Lodge
blockb: Action: Character spends 8 progress to remove one psyche condition.
